name: Ext_R4_MedicinalProductPackaged
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicinalProductPackaged for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: A medicinal product in a container or package
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Textual description
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.description from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Textual description
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.description from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The legal status of supply of the medicinal product as classified by the regulator
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.legalStatusOfSupply from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The legal status of supply of the medicinal product as classified by the regulator
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.legalStatusOfSupply from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Marketing information
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.marketingStatus from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The country in which the marketing authorisation has been granted shall be specified It should be specified using the ISO 3166 ‑ 1 alpha-2 code elements
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.country from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The country in which the marketing authorisation has been granted shall be specified It should be specified using the ISO 3166 ‑ 1 alpha-2 code elements
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.country from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Where a Medicines Regulatory Agency has granted a marketing authorisation for which specific provisions within a jurisdiction apply, the jurisdiction can be specified using an appropriate controlled terminology The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.jurisdiction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Where a Medicines Regulatory Agency has granted a marketing authorisation for which specific provisions within a jurisdiction apply, the jurisdiction can be specified using an appropriate controlled terminology The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.jurisdiction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: This attribute provides information on the status of the marketing of the medicinal product See ISO/TS 20443 for more information and examples
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: This attribute provides information on the status of the marketing of the medicinal product See ISO/TS 20443 for more information and examples
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorisation Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.dateRange from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorisation Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.dateRange from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorisation Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.restoreDate from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The date when the Medicinal Product is placed on the market by the Marketing Authorisation Holder (or where applicable, the manufacturer/distributor) in a country and/or jurisdiction shall be provided A complete date consisting of day, month and year shall be specified using the ISO 8601 date format NOTE “Placed on the market” refers to the release of the Medicinal Product into the distribution chain
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MarketingStatus.restoreDate from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Data type name for MedicinalProductPackaged.marketingStatus from FHIR R4

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.marketingAuthorization from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Manufacturer of this Package Item
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.marketingAuthorization from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.manufacturer from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.manufacturer from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.batchIdentifier from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: A number appearing on the outer packaging of a specific batch
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.batchIdentifier.outerPackaging from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: A number appearing on the immediate packaging (and not the outer packaging)
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.batchIdentifier.immediatePackaging from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: A packaging item, as a contained for medicine, possibly with other packaging items within
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.packageItem from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Including possibly Data Carrier Identifier

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.packageItem.identifier from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The physical type of the container of the medicine
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.packageItem.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The physical type of the container of the medicine
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.packageItem.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The quantity of this package in the medicinal product, at the current level of packaging. The outermost is always 1
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.packageItem.quantity from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The quantity of this package in the medicinal product, at the current level of packaging. The outermost is always 1
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.packageItem.quantity from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.packageItem.material from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.packageItem.alternateMaterial from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Shelf Life and storage information
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductPackaged.packageItem.shelfLifeStorage from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Unique identifier for the packaged Medicinal Product
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents ProductShelfLife.identifier from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Unique identifier for the packaged Medicinal Product
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents ProductShelfLife.identifier from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: This describes the shelf life, taking into account various scenarios such as shelf life of the packaged Medicinal Product itself, shelf life after transformation where necessary and shelf life after the first opening of a bottle, etc. The shelf life type shall be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents ProductShelfLife.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: This describes the shelf life, taking into account various scenarios such as shelf life of the packaged Medicinal Product itself, shelf life after transformation where necessary and shelf life after the first opening of a bottle, etc. The shelf life type shall be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents ProductShelfLife.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The shelf life time period can be specified using a numerical value for the period of time and its unit of time measurement The unit of measurement shall be specified in accordance with ISO 11240 and the resulting terminology The symbol and the symbol identifier shall be used
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents ProductShelfLife.period from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: The shelf life time period can be specified using a numerical value for the period of time and its unit of time measurement The unit of measurement shall be specified in accordance with ISO 11240 and the resulting terminology The symbol and the symbol identifier shall be used
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents ProductShelfLife.period from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Special precautions for storage, if any, can be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents ProductShelfLife.specialPrecautionsForStorage from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Special precautions for storage, if any, can be specified using an appropriate controlled vocabulary The controlled term and the controlled term identifier shall be specified
element.definition: This cross-version extension represents ProductShelfLife.specialPrecautionsForStorage from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductPackaged|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Data type name for MedicinalProductPackaged.packageItem.shelfLifeStorage from FHIR R4
